mapper.select: SELECT ll.id, ll.user_id, u.username, ll.target_type, ll.target_id, ll.action_type, ll.action_time, ll.duration, ll.detail FROM learning_logs ll JOIN users u ON ll.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN chapters c ON (ll.target_type = 'CHAPTER' AND ll.target_id = c.id) LEFT JOIN concepts cn ON (ll.target_type = 'CONCEPT' AND ll.target_id = cn.id) LEFT JOIN chapters cn_ch ON (ll.target_type = 'CONCEPT' AND cn.chapter_id = cn_ch.id) WHERE ll.user_id = #{userId} AND ( (ll.target_type = 'CHAPTER' AND c.course_id = #{courseId}) OR (ll.target_type = 'CONCEPT' AND (cn.chapter_id IS NULL OR cn_ch.course_id = #{courseId})) OR (ll.target_type = 'COURSE' AND ll.target_id = #{courseId}) ) ORDER BY ll.action_time DESC LIMIT 1
